Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: init(clientErrorCode:)
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: An initializer to set up the client error codes.

Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.name: init(restError:)
Extensions/RequestError.html#/s:15Kitura.abstract: An initializer to switch between different error types.

Extensions/RequestError.html.name: RequestError
Extensions/RequestError.html.abstract: An extension to Kitura RequestErrors with additional error codes specifically for the client.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC1.name: defaultBaseURL
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC1.abstract: Default URL used for setting up the routes when no URL is provided in the initializer.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC7.name: default
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC7.abstract: Default route used for setting up the paths based on the URL provided in the initializer.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC7.name: baseURL
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC7.abstract: Customisable URL used for setting up the routes when initializing a new KituraKit instance.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC2.name: containsSelfSignedCert
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC2.abstract: Boolean identiying whether the baseURL endpoint uses a self-seigned certificate and should be accepted

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAACA.name: init(baseURL:containsSelfSignedCert:)
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAACA.abstract: An initializer to set up a custom KituraKit instance on a specified route.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC3.name: get(_:identifier:respondWith:)
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC3.abstract: Retrieves data from a designated route with an Identifier.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC4.name: post(_:data:respondWith:)
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC4.abstract: Sends data to a designated route, allowing for the route to respond with an additional Identifier.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC3.name: put(_:identifier:data:respondWith:)
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC3.abstract: Updates data for a designated route using an Identifier.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC5.name: patch(_:identifier:data:respondWith:)
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC5.abstract: Updates data for a designated route using an Identifier.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC6.name: delete(_:identifier:respondWith:)
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC6.abstract: Deletes data at a designated route using an Identifier.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC3.name: get(_:query:respondWith:)
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC3.abstract: Retrieves data at a designated route using a the specified Query Parameters.

Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC6.name: delete(_:query:respondWith:)
Classes/KituraKit.html#/s:9KituraKitAAC6.abstract: Deletes data at a designated route using a the specified Query Parameters.

Classes/KituraKit.html.name: KituraKit
Classes/KituraKit.html.abstract: A client side library for using REST requests in a web application.
